synopsis.text: Tsukuda Mina is an ordinary high school girl with dreams of becoming a sports announcer for her favorite news program. However, her life is turned upside down when aliens who love sports attack the baseball stadium she is covering for her first big announcing job. In the chaos, Mina discovers latent powers awakening within her - she is actually a magical girl warrior named Tsukishiro Mina, part of an elite force called Rabbit Force. Their duty is to protect Earth's sports from invading aliens and defeat those who threaten sporting events. Now Mina must balance her responsibilities as a protector of sports with achieving her dream career in sports broadcasting. After finally getting the chance to live her dream, she must also take on the huge responsibility of keeping sports safe from extraterrestrial threats. It's a whole new ball game for this magical girl turned sports announcer!
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
